TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CustomWidgetApplyHandler(object o, CustomWidgetApplyArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed CustomWidgetApplyHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the CustomWidgetApplyHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the CustomWidgetApplyHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the CustomWidgetApplyHandler is removed from the event.
